description: Named after the Swedish skater Ulrich Salchow.

entries.meaning: A figure skating jump with a takeoff from a back inside edge and landing on the back outside edge of the opposite foot after one or more rotations in the air.

verbs.description: salchow (third-person singular simple present salchows, present participle salchowing, simple past and past participle salchowed)

entries.meaning: (intransitive) To perform a figure skating jump of this kind.
